name: pull-the-other-one
title: Pull the Other One
description:
This is specifically a Mini Puzzle dungeon I created for my players.
If you use it, give me a shout-out on how it went.

1)	Created by Dr. Feargood using Dungeon Alchemist and Photoshop.
2)	Free Stone door sound from Freesound - Freesound, and purchased lightbulb image.
3)	Puzzle idea from AAW Games: Acanthusâ€™s Conundrums #14: Puzzles & Riddles for RPGs - AAW Games (adventureaweek.com)
